attributes.action: fly the English flag on public buildings in England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the Scots will be flying the Scottish flag as opposed to the Union Flag on public buildings, then the English flag should be flying in England, or in both countries the Union and local flag should be flown. It's humiliating and pointless for the English to celebrate union with a country (Scotland), by flying the Union Flag, that openly mocks it and won't fly the Union Flag.
